column5: Hello everyone  Does anybody know if they are still closed? Can't find anything online. Thank you

I went for a drive a week ago for a look and it was still closed. I don't think anything has changed I'm local and I haven't heard anything about it opening up. I'm pretty sure that the upper launch ramps are still open but don't quote me on this one. I didn't drive up there for a look.
Thanks ;) Looks like no fishing in the area at all.
Thanks Steve! So frustrating about that closing. Everyone is keeping the distance and still... not allowed to enjoy the fishing
oh yes those 30 lb barricades would most certainly keep me outü§´
I bet hand cuffs and the back seat of an Niagara Regional Police cruiser would though!
Plenty of parking down below too.¬†¬†üòÅ
morning everyone any news on this one? Did they open or still restricted?
I heard from a good source early April after the pay meters are installed. I dont mind the pay meters.¬† But to keep them closed now is beyond ridiculous.
